Public Remarks: Lovely gently-sloping 9+ acres just 2 km up Thorley Road from downtown Hixon. Driveway access is right at the intersection of Thorley Road and Noak Road. The large piece is just over 8 acres and the smaller one is about 1 acre. The property has been cleared, with some treed left for a windbreak and riparian zone at the creek on the west and north boundaries. Lots of trails through out the Ranch for cross country skiing, hiking and walking. There are 2 lakes for fishing, or kayaking. A great year round family area. L#8621
